string-array.name: management_values
string-array.item: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fnsentences_text_fts4 USING fts4(sentenceid integer not null, text); INSERT INTO fnsentences_text_fts4 SELECT sentenceid, text from fnsentences;
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS index_pm_wordid ON pm(wordid); CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS index_pm_synsetid ON pm(synsetid);
DROP INDEX IF EXISTS index_pm_wordid; DROP INDEX IF EXISTS index_pm_synsetid;
ALTER TABLE lexdomains ADD COLUMN lexdomain varchar(32); UPDATE lexdomains SET lexdomain = SUBSTR(lexdomainname, INSTR(lexdomainname, \'.\')+1);
CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS samplesets AS SELECT synsetid, GROUP_CONCAT(samples.sample, \'|\' ) AS sampleset FROM samples GROUP BY synsetid;
